suivie.title: SuiVie
suivie.description: SuiVie is a web application inspired by the Bullet Journal's trackers tool. It aims to track your habits like sports, food, hygiene, self-care, expenses... Even if it works on desktop, it is designed for mobile devices. I work alone on this project.

grottocenter.title: Grottocenter
grottocenter.description: Grottocenter is a community world database dedicated to speleology and based on the wiki collaborative system. Since 2019, as a freelancer, I have worked on various features (authentication, notifications, advanced search, document submission) & I have been involved in the architecture choices, code maintenance and many refactorings.

about.part1: I'm a human being and also a web developer. I like to build user-friendly and beautiful web interfaces but also useful and practical REST API for other developers. I have graduated in computer science engineering in 2019. I am constantly learning and improving my self to enhance my code quality: refactoring, reducing repetitions, testing and documenting my code is a core part of my workflow.
about.part2: I am thriving by developing solution for meaningful organizations, which work on fields like education, health, protection of the environment, climate change fighting or knowledge sharing.
about.part3: When I'm not pixel-perfecting a web interface or pushing an API refactoring on GitHub, I'm making music at the Onyx Studio. You will also find me hiking in the Ariège Pyrenees (South of France), picking mushrooms or chestnuts.

built-using: Website built using Vue.js framework and SASS (SCSS) only
